MGT2.Title: Mongoose Traveller 2e (Very Unofficial)
MGT2.Settings.Verbose.Name: Verbose Skill Rolls
MGT2.Settings.Verbose.Hint: Displays effect and chain results of skill rolls.
MGT2.Settings.ChatIcons.Name: Use Chat Icons
MGT2.Settings.ChatIcons.Hint: Displays avatars of the character in skill rolls.
MGT2.Settings.QuickRolls.Name: Default to Quick Rolls
MGT2.Settings.QuickRolls.Hint: Reverse the use of click and shift-click for skill rolls.
